queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,size,ClassID;
SELECT 
  COMPONENTS(parentPath, 3) as "Storage Location",
  COUNT(name) as "File Count",
  SUM(size) as "Total Size (Bytes)",
  SUM(size)/1073741824 as "Total Size (GB)"
WHERE
  ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
GROUP BY 
  COMPONENTS(parentPath, 3)
ORDER BY 
  "Total Size (Bytes)" DESC

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,size,classification,classifications;
SELECT 
  classification as "Classification Type",
  COUNT(name) as "File Count",
  SUM(size)/1073741824 as "Total Size (GB)",
  COMPONENTS(parentPath, 3) as "Primary Location"

  classifications NOT LIKE '%Unclassified%'
GROUP BY 
  classification, COMPONENTS(parentPath, 3)
ORDER BY 
  "File Count" DESC

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=name,size,dupCount,dupKey;
SELECT 
  SUM(CASE WHEN dupCount > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Unique Files with Duplicates",
  SUM(CASE WHEN dupCount > 1 THEN dupCount - 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Total Duplicate Files",
  SUM(CASE WHEN dupCount > 1 THEN size * (dupCount - 1) ELSE 0 END) as "Potential Space Savings (Bytes)",
  SUM(CASE WHEN dupCount > 1 THEN size * (dupCount - 1) ELSE 0 END)/1073741824 as "Potential Space Savings (GB)"

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=createTime,size,name,ClassID;

  CASE 
    WHEN createTime >= '2024-12-19' THEN '0-90 Days'
    WHEN createTime >= '2024-03-18' THEN '91-365 Days'
    WHEN createTime >= '2023-03-18' THEN '1-2 Years'

    WHEN createTime >= '2024-03-18' THEN '91-365 Days'
    WHEN createTime >= '2023-03-18' THEN '1-2 Years'
    ELSE '2+ Years'
  END

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,extension,size,createTime,modifyTime,accessTime,ClassID;
SELECT 
  extension as "File Extension",
  CASE 
    WHEN accessTime < '2024-09-18' THEN 'Not Accessed in 6+ Months'
    WHEN modifyTime < '2024-09-18' THEN 'Not Modified in 6+ Months'
    ELSE 'Recently Active'
  END as "Activity Status",
  COUNT(name) as "File Count",
  SUM(size)/1073741824 as "Total Size (GB)"
WHERE 
  createTime < '2024-09-18' AND
  ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
GROUP BY 
  extension, 
  CASE 
    WHEN accessTime < '2024-09-18' THEN 'Not Accessed in 6+ Months'
    WHEN modifyTime < '2024-09-18' THEN 'Not Modified in 6+ Months'
    ELSE 'Recently Active'
  END
ORDER BY
  extension

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=name,extension,metadataObject,ClassID,metadata;
SELECT
name as "File Name",
metadataObject as "Email Metadata",
COUNT(name) as "Email Count"
WHERE
extension = 'eml'
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
AND metadata LIKE ('%"Message:From-Email":"%@%"%')
AND metadata NOT LIKE ('%"Message:From-Email":"%@nowakelabs.com%"%')
GROUP BY
name, metadataObject
ORDER BY
"Email Count" DESC
LIMIT 25

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=name,extension,metadataObject,ClassID,metadata;
SELECT
name as "File Name",
metadataObject as "Email Metadata",
COUNT(name) as "Message Count"
WHERE
extension = 'eml'
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
AND (
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%confidential%"%') OR
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%sensitive%"%') OR
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%private%"%') OR
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%personal%"%') OR
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%financial%"%') OR
metadata LIKE ('%"dc:subject":"%agreement%"%')
)
GROUP BY
name, metadataObject
ORDER BY
COUNT(name) DESC
LIMIT 100

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=name,extension,createTime,modifyTime,metadataObject,ClassID,metadata;
SELECT 
  YEAR(createTime) as "Year",
  MONTH(createTime) as "Month",
  -- Only mixed subtype classified as having attachments
  SUM(CASE WHEN metadata LIKE ('%"Multipart-Subtype":"mixed"%') 
           THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "With Attachments",
  
  -- All other subtypes AND missing subtype field classified as without attachments
  SUM(CASE WHEN metadata NOT LIKE ('%"Multipart-Subtype":"mixed"%')
           THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Without Attachments",
           
  -- Total count
  COUNT(name) as "Total Emails"
WHERE 
  extension = 'eml' 
  AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
GROUP BY
  YEAR(createTime), MONTH(createTime)
ORDER BY
  "Year", "Month"

  SUM(CASE WHEN metadata NOT LIKE ('%"Multipart-Subtype":"mixed"%')
           THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Without Attachments",
           
  -- Total count

WHERE

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=name,size,dupCount,dupKey,parentPath,ClassID;
SELECT
name as "File Name",
size as "Size (Bytes)",
size/1073741824 as "Size (GB)",
dupCount as "Duplicate Count",
parentPath as "Location",
dupKey as "Duplicate Key"
WHERE
dupCount > 1
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
ORDER BY
dupCount DESC,
size DESC
LIMIT 100;

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,ClassID;
SELECT
CASE
WHEN parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%' THEN '00 - Root Level'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%' THEN '01 - One Level Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%' THEN '02 - Two Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%' THEN '03 - Three Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '04 - Four Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '05 - Five Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '06 - Six Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '07 - Seven Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '08 - Eight Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '09 - Nine Levels Deep'
WHEN parentPath LIKE '/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' AND parentPath NOT LIKE '%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%/%' THEN '10 - Ten Levels Deep'
ELSE '11+ - Very Deep Paths'
END as "Directory Depth",

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=extension,createTime,name,size,ClassID;


-- Note: Since AQL doesn't support complex subqueries, focus on common file types instead


SELECT
extension as "File Type",
YEAR(createTime) as "Year",
COUNT(name) as "File Count",
SUM(size)/1048576 as "Total Size (MB)"
WHERE
ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
AND extension IN ('docx', 'xlsx', 'pdf', 'jpg', 'png', 'txt', 'pptx', 'csv', 'zip', 'html')
GROUP BY
extension, YEAR(createTime)
ORDER BY
extension, YEAR(createTime);

SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,extension,osOwner,modifyTime,size,ClassID;
SELECT
extension as "File Type",
COUNT(name) as "File Count",
SUM(size)/1048576 as "Total Size (MB)",
-- Using basic date functions for better readability
CONCAT(YEAR(MAX(modifyTime)), '-', MONTH(MAX(modifyTime)), '-', DAY(MAX(modifyTime))) as "Most Recent Modified Date"
WHERE
extension IN ('exe','dll','bat','sh','ps1','vbs','js','py')
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
GROUP BY
extension
ORDER BY
COUNT(name) DESC;

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,classification,confidence,classifications,extension,osOwner,modifyTime,size,ClassID;
SELECT
classification as "Classification",
confidence as "Confidence Score",
COUNT(name) as "File Count",
SUM(size)/1048576 as "Total Size (MB)",
CONCAT(YEAR(MAX(modifyTime)), '-', MONTH(MAX(modifyTime)), '-', DAY(MAX(modifyTime))) as "Most Recent Modified Date"
WHERE
(classification LIKE '%Authentication Policy%'
OR classification LIKE '%Ransomware Policy%'
OR classification LIKE '%IP Address Policy%'
OR classification LIKE '%Company Confidential%')
-- Only include classifications with a high confidence (85 or higher)
AND confidence >= 85
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
GROUP BY
classification,
confidence
ORDER BY
confidence DESC,
"File Count" DESC;

queries.value:
SET @@DEFAULT_COLUMNS=parentPath,name,classification,confidence,osOwner,createTime,modifyTime,ClassID;
-- Only selecting one classification field to avoid duplicates
SELECT
parentPath as "Path",
name as "File Name",
classification as "Classification",
confidence as "Confidence Score",
osOwner as "Owner",
createTime as "Created",
modifyTime as "Last Modified"
WHERE
(-- GDPR and Country-Specific Data Protection
classification LIKE '%GDPR%'
OR classification LIKE '%Personal Data Policy%'
-- Health Information
OR classification LIKE '%PHI%'
OR classification LIKE '%HIPAA%'
-- Sensitive data categories
OR classification LIKE '%Sensitive Data Policy%'
-- National ID documents
OR classification LIKE '%National ID%'
OR classification LIKE '%Passport%'
OR classification LIKE '%Drivers License%'
OR classification LIKE '%Tax Reference%'
-- PII general
OR classification LIKE '%PII%')
AND ClassID LIKE 'idxobject'
ORDER BY
confidence DESC,
modifyTime DESC;
